name: Lariat - Big Cartel theme optimized for mobile, tablet and desktop
description:
Features:
  • Responsive design adapts to mobile, tablet and desktop.
  • Fully customizable Header and Footer colors beyond Big Cartel's basic settings.
  • Quick view of product on products' pages without having to open a new page.
  • Pull down product menus for product categories and sub-categories.
  • Social Media icons can be any color or size.
  • Optional image carousel on the home page and on custom pages.
  • Mailing list functionality via Mail Chimp.
  • Product page supports hover to zoom on product images.
  • Facebook like, Tweet and Pinterest Pinit buttons on product pages.
  • Reasonably priced customizations to this theme are also available. Contact me for a quote

    • If you'd like me to install and setup this theme select the "with installation" option from the drop down list above the add to cart button.

    ***Requires a BigCartel Platinum, Diamond or Titanium plan***

name: Products' Quick View
description: Popup window to show a quick view of your products images and details without having to open another page. The popup also allows customers to add the item to their cart. A demonstration of this functionality can be viewed on my site by opening the products' page, hovering over any of the product images and then clicking the "Quick View" button. The $25 price is to add this functionality to Luna. An additional charge may apply to add this to a theme other than Luna. Contact me with a link to your site and I will give you a quote.

options.name: Installed on a theme other than Luna

name: Home Page Popup Box
description: A popup box that can be set to display when a customer lands on your home page once per day or every time they go to your home page. The popup can easily be turned on and off. Great for advertising sales, allowing your customers to sign up for mailing lists or for displaying other kinds of timely information. Currently the popup box accepts a single image but I can customize it to display whatever you'd like for a nominal fee. If you'd like to use this for something other than an image contact me with the details of what you'd like the popup to display and I'll get back to you with a quote.

options.name: Popup Box for a single image

name: Swiss - Big Cartel Theme optimized for mobile, tablet and desktop
description:
If you'd like me to install and setup this theme select the "with installation" option from the drop down list above the add to cart button. Below are a few of the sites currently using Swiss: MADleshop Dream State Snopics To see the various mobile, tablet and desktop layouts re-size your browser to the approximate width of those devices or load the preview using one of those devices. Features:
  • Responsive design adapts to mobile, tablet and desktop.
  • Change the background color behind the menu and shop name, as well as the menu text and hover colors. Many of the other colors for links, text and buttons are customizable as well. I have a few different color schemes to choose from or you can select your own color palette.
  • Image slider for the Home Page or custom pages.
  • Display either 3 large images per row or 4 medium images per row.
  • Display the product name and price under every product or only when you rollover a product image.
  • Ability to create pull down menus with sub-categories without having to modify any html or css.
  • Optional hover zoom on product pages. This functionality works best when your product images are 1000x1000 pixels as per Big Cartel's recommendations. If your images are small or irregularly shaped the hover zoom can easily be turned off.
  • Add your own custom header/logo.
  • Social media icons.
  • Mailing list functionality via free MailChimp service. Or I can implement the mailing list provider of your choice for an additional $10 charge.
  • Facebook like, tweet or pinterest pin it button on individual product pages.

    • I also take custom orders for this theme. Contact me for details.
    ***Requires a BigCartel Platinum, Diamond or Titanium plan***

name: Little Fawn - Big Cartel Theme
description:
You can test a full working demo here. Below are links to a few other sites currently using Little Fawn. Their custom headers, logos and use of photography are great examples of how to personalize this theme: Tangerinette Noemmi The Lovely Folk Love a Rhino SpoonLily Three Sweet Beads If you'd like me to install and setup this theme select the "with installation" option from the drop down list above the add to cart button. Features:
  • Ability to create pull down menus with sub-categories without having to modify any html or css.
  • Upload your own custom banner or logo. If your logo doesn't contain your shop name then you can easily display your logo and shop name side by side in the header.
  • Social media icons for Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Instagram, Google Plus, Flickr, Vimeo and You Tube. I have a couple of different sets of icons to choose from, or if you'd prefer to use your own icons I can install those for you.
  • Social media icons can be displayed at the top or bottom of the page, or can be hidden altogether.
  • Social media icons can take on any color to match your color scheme.
  • Optional Facebook like, tweet and Pinterest pin it buttons on product pages.
  • Customize fonts, text and link colors.
  • Choose to display 3, 4 or 5 products per row.
  • Choose to display the product name and price under every product or only when you rollover a product image.
  • Home page image slider that can easily be turned on or off.
  • Home page slider can be displayed by itself or with your products beneath.
  • Easily create multiple lookbooks.
  • Zoomed image when scrolling over a product image on individual product pages.
    • I also take custom orders for this theme. Contact me for details.
    *** Requires a BigCartel Platinum, Diamond or Titanium plan ***

name: Agile Fawn - Big Cartel Theme optimized for mobile, tablet and desktop
description:
If you'd like me to install and setup this theme select the "with installation" option from the drop down list above the add to cart button. Below are links to a few sites currently using Agile Fawn. Their custom headers and use of images are great examples of how to best utilize the features in this theme: The Little Card Boutique Mossy Creek Studio Kokito To see the various mobile, tablet and desktop layouts re-size your browser to the approximate width of those devices or load the preview using one of those devices. Features:
  • Responsive design adapts to mobile, tablet and desktop.
  • Add your own header/logo image.
  • Display either 3 large product images per row or 4 medium product images per row.
  • Display the product name and price under every product or only when you rollover a product.
  • Ability to create pull down menus with sub-categories without having to modify any html or css.
  • Mailing list functionality via free MailChimp service. Or I can implement the mailing list provider of your choice for an additional $10 charge.
  • Social media icons that can be set to any color
  • Facebook like, tweet or pinterest pin it button on individual product pages.
  • Image carousel for the Home Page or on custom pages.

    • I also take custom orders for this theme. Contact me for details.
    ***Requires a BigCartel Platinum, Diamond or Titanium plan***

name: Shopify Customizations
description:
Reasonably priced customizations for your Shopify site. If you haven't signed up for Shopify already and sign up via this referral link (which comes with a 14 day free trial), I will give you up to a 20% discount on any work performed. Contact me for a specific discount quote. Demo of customizations I made to Shopify's free "Minimal" theme for Regal Rose If the work you need done is not listed below then contact me and I'll get back to you right away with a quote. Available Options:
  • Mailing list - $15
  • Wishlist - $15
  • Notify when in stock button - $15
  • Social media icons & mailing list - $20
  • Image slider/lookbooks - $15
  • Single page modifications: $10 - $20 (contact me for details)

name: Luna Product Page Template with Hover Zoom
description: Provides a new look for Big Cartel's Luna product page with clickable thumbnails that change the larger product image. When the cursor hovers over the larger image a zoomed portion of that image will appear to the right. Try a Live Demo of this template. Thumbnails can appear on the left, right or bottom of the larger product image. Free Installation.

name: Splash Page for Big Cartel Themes
description: Demo Page can be modified to accept any number of links. All you have to supply is the graphic image you want displayed above the menu. Free Installation. Please contact me before ordering so I can make sure the Big Cartel theme you're using can be modified to accept a splash page. I accept custom orders for this item.

name: Big Cartel & Other Website Customization
description:
Reasonably priced customizations for your personal website or Big Cartel shop. I specialize in modifying Big Cartel shops but I can also work with any other kind of site you might be running. If the work you need done is not listed below then contact me and I'll get back to you with a quote. Available Options
  • Big Cartel Theme install - $10
  • Domain setup - $15
  • Social media icons - $15
  • Mailing list - $15
  • Notify when in stock button - $15
  • Social media icons & mailing list - $25 (Demo)
  • Photo Gallery (Grid Layout) - $15 (Demo)
  • Photo Gallery (3 column grid with html captions) - $15 (Demo)
  • Image slider/lookbooks - $15
  • Extended fonts via Google Fonts - $15
  • Gift box/wrapping option on Cart Page - $15
  • Package Tracking option on Cart Page - $15
  • Splash home page - $15 (Demo)
  • Social Media Feeds - $15 (Demo)
  • Home Page Popup Box - $20 (Demo)
  • Drop down product menus - $20
  • Luna home page product category names and images - $20 (Demo)
  • Single page modifications to any of Big Cartel's free themes - $10 - $20
*** Big Cartel customizations require a Big Cartel Platinum, Diamond or Titanium plan ***

options.name: Photo Gallery (3 column grid with html captions)
Package Tracking option on Cart Page
Option for Gift Wrapping/Box on Cart Page

name: Sidecar Customizations
description:
• Centered header (with optional sub-header). This can be an image or text - $10
  • Social media icons (or just plain text links) - $15
  • Mailing list - $15
  • Other additions to the sidebar - $15
  • Additional fonts via Google Fonts - $15

    • If you'd like something done to sidecar that is not on the list above please contact me for a quote.

name: Luna Product Page Template
description: Provides a new look for Luna's product page with clickable thumbnails that change the larger product image. Try a Live Demo of this template. Thumbnails can appear on the left, right or bottom of the larger product image. Free Installation.

name: Lookbook Photo Shoot
description: Lookbooks are vital for helping your customer to visualize what they might look like either wearing or owning your products and help to show off what you have to offer. They can include any range of items, and chances are if you have a website or shop where you sell any type of product, a lookbook is for you! The model, location, and styling for the lookbook are all important aspects in showcasing your products and can help optimize sales. Even if you are outside of SoCal, I can help you to make your vision a reality, and take care of the entire photo shoot process. This includes finding a model, make-up artist, hair stylist and scouting for the perfect location, on top of photographing the lookbook and post processing your photos (with expenses paid by you, of course). In this case I will need a budget to work with in order to ensure everyone, including myself, is paid fairly. If you are local and just need a photographer for your lookbook, pricing will begin at $60 (per look/outfit change) at the location of your choice and travel fees outside of Los Angeles may apply. If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact me at tressascharf@gmail.com and I'll be happy to clear up any confusion. *Please note: a 50% retainer is required to secure a date. Discussing a project does not insure you will get a spot on my calendar-- other 50% of payment required before you receive your edited images. Depending on how many products you are having shot, projects typically take 1-3 weeks to complete. Availability and any special needs should be discussed in advance.

name: Logos
description:
pricing- $5 for the color, font, and shape of your choice. shapes include: square, circle, oval, triangle, star, anchor, heart, or any letter of the alphabet.

$10 for a photo logo with your choice of font and in the shape of your choice. your own picture or one from my stock of images.

$20 for a generic photo logo of your choice with desired font and in the shape of your choice.  You tell me what you want your logo background picture to be (for example: a pumpkin, baking utensils, an open field, flowers, etc.) and I will do my best to capture it.  If you have something specific that you want photographed, you can ship it to me if you wish (and if possible) and I will ship it back once finished.  

*Please note: I will not be drawing or designing any logos outside of what has been listed above.

name: Product Photography
description:
One of the many keys to a successful business is having a website with a visually pleasing, clean aesthetic, and product shots to match.  It isn't something that everyone has the eye for, but with the help and talent from photographer Tressa Scharf, you can boost your website visuals from amateur to professional.  She will deliver product shots that will entice your customers and make them want to buy whatever you might be selling, with excellent attention to detail, product styling and placement, and a trained eye.  No project is too big or small; you can choose to have your products shot in a natural (outdoor, household etc.) environment, or Tressa's home studio.  Products must be shipped or dropped off if you are local to Southern California. If your project doesn't allow for either of these options, she can also travel to you (additional costs may apply). 
*Pricing includes photo shoot of products and post processing with a digital compressed file of your high-res edited images and starts at $100.

Pricing:
(For smaller products ie. jewelry, cameras, baked goods, shoes, etc.)
$10 per product - minimum of 10 products
20% off for 20 - 49 products
30% off for 50 - 100 products

(Clothing: tops, dresses, shirts, pants, handbags, etc)
$12 per product - minimum of 10 products
20% off for 20 - 49 products
30% off for 50 - 100 products

name: Mint - Tumblr Theme optimized for desktop, tablet & mobile
description:
Preview (To view responsive features open the Preview up on your phone or tablet, or re-size your desktop browser to the relative size of those devices.)
    Features:
  • Responsive design adapts to desktop, tablet and mobile
  • Multiple categories with sub-categories can be added to the menu or the sidebar
  • Menu sub-categories appear in pull down menus
  • Upload your own logo
  • Upload a background image or use the one provided
  • Change the background color of the header, footer, date bubbles and sidebar headings
  • Change the font on the Body, Headings, Menu and Site Title
  • Multiple options for the main menu
  • Social media icons can be turned on simply by adding the respective username for each service.
  • Disqus comment support

name: Image slider/carousel install
description: Integration of an image slider into your Big Cartel shop or website. Demo

name: Dropdown Menus for Big Cartel Sites
description:
Installation of dropdown menus for your Big Cartel shop. Demo: Big Cartel's Luna theme customized with Dropdown menus Requirements:
  • BigCartel Diamond, Platinum or Titanium plan.
  • Your menus should already be horizontal. If you are using vertical menus please contact me first so I can see what would be involved to switch over to horizontal menus--such a conversion might require an additional charge.
  • I'll need temporary access to your BigCartel design area to install the code for the menus.

name: Big Cartel Theme Install in less than 30 minutes
description:
If you don't have the time or technical expertise to install your Big Cartel theme you bought from me or even another vendor I can get your site up and running in less than 30 minutes. 

Requirements:
*  In order for me to install your theme you will need to give me temporary access to your BigCartel design area.
